data.message: Facebook is about connecting people all across the globe, especially family and friends *~*

replies.message: That’s right, Meden! Thanks for being part of our community. -Chantal

Yeah its a great social media platform until they block your account and say your a fake..  Even though you have been on Facebook for over 6 years...  Still a VERY VERY frustrated user..  Not happy with facebook tossing darts at names they feel are not real names of people..  Specially when the people have been on facebook for over 5 years and its their real name and they prove it on their GOVT ID..
HEY Facebook CAN YOU MAKE THE NEWS FEED ANY SMALLER AND THE ADS ON THE RIGHT ANY LARGER?  I'M TYPING IN ALL CAPS TO MAKE IT EASIER FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A HARD TIME SEEING THE SMALL FONT.
